DOC.brief_summary: This single arm , single center pilot study 40 patient uT3N0 uT1-3N+ rectal cancer receive pre-operative chemoradiation . Subjects undergo PET/MRI scan surgery .
DOC.brief_title: PET/MRI Predictor Response Pre-op Chemoradiation Resectable Rectal Cancer : Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study determine negative predictive value PET/MRI determine pathological complete response neoadjuvant chemoradiation .
